pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: @eric-wieser Are we happy to merge this yet?

:v: eric-wieser can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7589648530/job/20674727288)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7589648530/job/20674726556)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7589648530/job/20674727033)

The last half of this last line is not just an implementation note; the fact that `Finite` works on propositions is a user-visible feature, and very useful for working with indexed finite collections, such as when using `Finsum` or `iSup`

I think it's worth having near the top: Finite is a) itself prop not data, and b) works on proof types as well a data types. Both are important API features, and often when you generalize a theorem for a) you should also try to do it for b)

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - docs: improve `Finite` docstring
